programme.title: Why Entry Level Jobs are Not Entry Level & Working From Home
programme.desc: Stop me if you’ve heard this one before. An entry level job paying eight dollars an hour with no benefits at an unremarkable company… Oh and they want you to have at least three years’ experience in a similar role and preferably a masters degree... Searching for a job is a difficult and time-consuming task. Most Americans do not have enough savings to survive for more than two weeks without going into debt which means it is also stressful. No matter how efficient the hiring process is made you are never going to have fun looking for a job and nothing can change that, but the corporate world has started to introduce a lot of obstacles that make the JOB of FINDING a JOB as painful as possible. It’s also simply bad business. Attracting the right talent is vital for business success. If businesses make their application process too difficult, they are going to filter out everybody but the most desperate candidates, which are rarely the BEST candidates. Companies that ask for multiple years of experience from applicants applying for entry level jobs also expose themselves to a similar risk. It might sound advantageous for the business to get an employee with years of experience that they can pay like a fresh graduate, but company management frequently overlook the reason that these applicants are looking for entry level jobs in a field they have been working in for years is that they are not that good at their job and they need to keep moving companies before their poor performance catches up with them. A recent study conducted by Portland State University and published by the Harvard Business Review found that overqualified candidates did not outperform the control group and that paying significantly under market rates for talent will cost most businesses more in other areas. Multiple rounds of interviews also take paid hours from HR, hiring managers and third-party recruiters. Recruiters work on a commission basis for successfully placed candidates, but if a company makes candidates go through multiple rounds of int

programme.title: You Suck at Investing & Is it too late to get ahead financially
programme.desc: Investing is the most important thing you can do to reliably build wealth during your life. The only problem is… you inevitably suck at it… The S&P 500 has a historical average return of 10.4 over the past 100 years, even when including all the major stock market downturns during that time. $10,000 invested in 1972 would be worth $1.7 Million today. But look around, and you will be hard pressed to find anybody who has made themselves wealthy EXCLUSIVELY through diligent investing practices. Research done by Dalbar Inc an investment research firm found that the average equity fund investor only made average annualized returns of 4.25 over the past 20 years. To understand how big a difference this truly is, the same investor getting those returns would only turn their initial $10,000 investment into $83,000 today over the same 50 year period.People are terrible at investing, YOU are terrible at investing, and even finance industry professionals are buy and large… terrible at investing.

programme.title: "Why Most People Are Actually ""Too Good"" For Their Job"
programme.desc: "This is a problem because no matter how you put it, a job where you sit in an air-conditioned office making six figures a year in your first year out of college is way more desirable than doing roadwork in Arizona for 20 bucks an hour. The problem is that everybody is trying really hard to pretend this isn’t true, and the system that has sprung up to maintain this dream has caused more problems than you realize."

programme.desc: This documentary movie tells the story of one of the most successful female paragliding pilots in history. Klaudia shows throughout her career that if you really want something there is no way to stop you to make it happen. Regardless many difficulties she manages to win the World Champion Title in 2013. But she didn’t stop there. Winning medals isn’t the goal but progress, pursuit of personal excellence, sharing joy with friends and motivating others to follow their dreams is.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City

programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they travel to Turkey, home to a surprisingly robust ski culture and some unique spots to film snow sports.

programme.desc: Tag along as the crew hunts lines in the high alpine of the Corsican Alps. Corsica is an island in the Mediterranean known more for its beaches than for its skiing, but that won't stop TGR from finding what they're looking for.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bridgestone took Chris to Portugal to ride their latest Adventure Tires, so which one is right for you and your bike? Chris spent a couple of weeks with the MV Agusta Superveloce 800, and he even managed to get it on track.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Chris has been back to M&P for another used bike review, this time, it's a Honda Gold Wing. Can he be won over by the comfortable heated armchair? Then, Chad heads back to Italy for the launch of the MV Agusta Enduro Veloce, is it worth it?

programme.title: FIA Motorsport Games
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Motorsport Games in Valencia, Spain, featured a diverse array of 26 disciplines across various motorsport categories.

programme.title: Vintage Charm
programme.desc: Vintage styles continue to cycle thru our wardrobes with subtle updates. Gretchen Hirsch epitomizes that vintage style with a lace bolero. Then, it's Kim Montagnese. Watch as she recycles a jacket with vintage details and demonstrates techniques for adding trims, lace and more. The show closes with Joanne Banko sharing tips for cutting and sewing silky fabrics.

programme.title: Table Top Glamour
programme.desc: Show off your style, when you create table top glamour. Your table is the star with this table setting from Rebecca Kemp Brent. Create beautiful accents and all over patterns using a frame. Then meet Joanne Hillestad and a beautiful table runner. This quick project personalizes your décor by season or color. Finally Angela is back with another tank variation; this time it's a lace insert.

programme.title: Getting Started in Jewelry Making
programme.desc: With a few supplies and cold connection techniques, designer Abbi Berta quickly creates mixed media earrings. She also makes a textured cuff with a torch-fired patina to introduce metalwork. Viewer Leslie Rocha tells how her first jewelry class and love of music blossomed into a passion for making jewelry from guitar wire and picks.

programme.title: Metalworking in Style
programme.desc: Express your style in metalwork and with lettering, too. Mary Hettmansperger adds a window in metal work to make a versatile bezel. She adds style by layering metals and putting a variety of motifs behind the window. Creative collaborator Brenda Schweder shares her favorite tips on soldering metalwork. Katie Hacker puts her style into words with lettering in Katie's Beading Lesson.

programme.title: Add-ons
programme.desc: Soup would be pretty boring if it was just broth. Scrapbook pages might also suffer the same fate without some interesting add-ons to rev them up. Explore beyond the norm with media mixage with Stacey Caron, add bezels, ribbon and buttons to create texture and dimension. Make a die cut frame with Jenny Barnett Rohrs and use up scraps of patterned paper in a grid design with Ronda Palazzari. Today's Scrapbook Soup is stocked with new ingredients.

programme.title: Aerial Tour of Kazimierz

programme.title: THE VESSEL
programme.desc: When a crack team of paranormal investigators lead by the Samsa foundation; enters an abandoned turn-of-the-century prison looking for answers to a two decade old murder of a wrongly executed man. The team, lead by Daniel Samsa (John Holgren) commissions the executed mans daughter Carrie (Daisy Leonard) and an ex-con; Hector (Dan Herrera) to summon the spirit of the executed man. Along with the help of a psychic drifter named Jason Brooks (Stu Brumbaugh) and his intuitive friend Frank (Mick ODay) the team soon learns that the mystery theyre pursuing isnt nearly as horrifying as the secrets hidden inside the jail itself. Once they find themselves and the prison on full lock-down, they must try and escape or come face to face with the terrible evil locked within.

programme.title: RUSTIN
programme.desc: Rustin is the story of Billy Stagen - former football hero, present small town sheriff and hero to everyone but himself. His comfortable way of life goes for a 180 as his 16 year old daughter that he has never met is brought into his life. Conflict comes to a head as Billy tries to raise his daughter and deal with the school thugs that are causing trouble in town.

programme.title: THREE DAYS OF HAMLET
programme.desc: A heros journey from the most unlikely of sources, a Shakespeare in Love for the reality set...What makes this first-person doc so unique is the heros personal narrative; an actor/manager, dealing with the ghost of his father, both real and imagined. Taking place over three days, they rehearse and perform a stage reading of Shakespeares classic -- in this day of mixed media and cultural attention deficit, a monumental task that is rendered gracefully. As the lives of the players juxtapose over their characters, what results is a fascinating look at how, once again, art illuminates life. By holding the mirror up to ourselves, we illuminate the world around us.

Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 16
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: Grab a Crab
programme.desc: Once the crab is running from the eagle and enters in the GrandPAs courtyard where Keet helps him hide and they become good friends.

programme.title: Recess
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: CAN I KEEP HER PLEASE?
programme.desc: Buzz finds a strange seed and tenderly nurtures it. The seed sprouts and blossoms into a healthy, baby plant he names Ruby. As Ruby grows, she eats more and more healthy food and becomes very large and aggressive towards the other Creepy Candy TM. Ty-Poe suggests that Ruby be moved to a different environment out in nature. Will Buzz let her go, will she go peacefully, will the other Creepy CandyTM be eaten? Watch the funny and action packed episode to find out what happens.

programme.title: Smightycorns
programme.desc: Melody and the magical Smightycorns perform at a festival, while the Villains try to ruin the day by disguising themselves as one. When Sneevil and Biggs get their hands on the Air Stone, a winding chase ensues through the Magic Region.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: FOREIGN DREAMS
programme.desc: A European couple visits the shop and they are thoroughly impressed by Chai Rajas cooking skills. They instantly give him a flight ticket to Europe to open a restaurant there. Chai Raja is already daydreaming about his wonderful hotel life in Europe. He puts a board in front of the shop HOTEL CLOSED, shuts down business and get ready to pack his things. Sundar and Basha are both shocked! Now they have to do everything in the world to make Chai Raja stay back. They try to bring back customers, try to mess up Chai Rjas preparation. Even the customers help the duo in stopping Chai Raja in a nice way. Basha is not happy with Sundars tricks and Sundar is not happy with Bashas. This inadvertently leads to a manic chase between the two. But Chai Raja screams to stop the duo. The next moment Chai Raja takes his baggage and is about to leave. When he sees the crowd of customers sadly waiting outside to bid him good bye. The wrestler even comes and hugs him crying. Sundar is sad. Basha is sad. Chai Raja cant take this. He tears the ticket into pieces, goes inside the hotel, turns on the radio..and STARTS MAKING TEA!!! Everything is back to normal including the duos chase.

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: FIRST COME FIRST SERVE
programme.desc: Sundar wakes up late and finds a glaring Chai Raja stand towering over him. He rushes to take his station as business begins but alas his headache is about to get much worse for Basha has decided to sabotage each and every customer who walks in Chai Rajas door that day. To make matters worse, a wrestler turns up at the shop and demands that he be the one to be served first always. Chai Rajas rhythm is distorted by the wrestlers hankering and all goes for a toss. Basha disguises and manages to grab the wrestlers attention who now demands that Sundar serve Basha. But Sundar finds out its Basha and chases him. The lovestruck wrestler, woebegone at losing his love punches Sundar into orbit while Basha looks on gleefully.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Gummys Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Dinosaur crossing
programme.desc: A young prehistoric boy is struggling with a dinosaur that in its frantic race threatens to overwhelm all. With the help of a chameleon, the twins will help the boy to resolve the situation.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Straw
programme.desc: Reduce waste by giving straws a second more fun life!

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: What a mess!
programme.desc: The twins meet a girl who lost the key to her bike lock because she’s so untidy.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Don't Knock It Till You Have Built It
programme.desc: When Valeo breaks a hole from the Zooniverse INTO Pancake’s room, a swarm of Splutterbies enter as well, destroying Pancake’s house! Put yourself in someone else’s place to see how your actions might affect them and never give up in trying to accomplish your goals.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: 1,2,3… Smile~
programme.desc: Duda discovers Dadas digital camera. Suddenly, he becomes hooked on taking photos. Scot shows up thinking they are going on a picnic. But, he finds out that they are going swimming in the lake instead. Ashamed of not knowing how to swim, Scot tries to practice in a kiddie pool when no one is around. Unfortunately, Duda captures Scots embarrassing moment on camera. Afraid that Duda will show the photo to others, Scot is determined to delete it at all costs. After losing his boat to Duda in a bet, Scot becomes frantic when he sees his friends taking a ride on it with Duda and his camera. Without thinking, Scot jumps into the lake to go after them. Will Scot be okay?

programme.title: Treasure Map Adventure
programme.desc: The Super Six and Sneevil race to find a hidden treasure over land and sea, facing obstacles along the way. When they enter the Smightymuda Triangle, things get even rockier and wild. Who will make it out and find the treasure first?

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Fake Robot Parents
programme.desc: When her Fake Robot Parents visit her school, Brains real Dad orders her to take the robots out more and let them interact with people…which is really embarrassing.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Tell Me Your Wish
programme.desc: A new friend visits the Unknown Forest. Its Annie, Cabers adventure-loving cousin. Its love at first sight for Duda. Wanting to impress, Doubt tells a little white lie and announces to everyone that there is a magic box by the Hot Hot Springs that grants wishes. He borrows Scots box and hides inside as if he were the genie in the box. His friends come and each makes a wish, forcing Duda to do everything he can to grant them. Finally, its Annies turn. Unfortunately, she wishes for a fluffy white cloud. Not wanting to disappoint Annie, Duda tries his hardest to literally reach for the sky. Somehow, Annie realizes that it was Duda with the magic box all along. Seeing that he struggles to catch a cloud for her, she decides to change her wish...

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: The Emperor Comes to Town
programme.desc: The Emperor of China is coming to town and the people of Baghdad are tasked to put on their best show as he passes through the market. Genie is thrilled, what talent shall he put on to impress the Emperor? Jamillah has a great idea for a circus act, and she asks them both to help her do a running cartwheel only they all fall over when they try in front of the Emperor and a very angry Grand Vizier. Just when hes about to send them all to jail however, the Emperor chuckles, he thinks its all hilarious! As a prize he invites them all to dine with him and the Sultan.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Driving Pinkar
programme.desc: Scot is determined to drive to Pinkar today. So, wait for your chance to do just that. Unfortunately, Duda shows up and ruins their plans. Duda sits in the drivers seat and pretends to drive Pinkar, but Pinkar starts moving. While Duda enjoys the unexpected trip, Scot hides in the back of the car. When Scot reveals himself, he discovers that Duda doesnt know how to drive, and the pleasant trip quickly turns into a hair-raising one. Caber sees Duda behind the wheel and runs to tell Dada. Dada and the gang rush to stop Pinkar before Duda ends up in the lake. Everyone does what they can to help, but in the end, it is Scot who manages to stop Pinkar at the last moment.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: Royal Egg – Ugly Duckling
programme.desc: Everybody knows the story of the UGLY DUCKLING: the adventures and misadventures of a little swan that is born far from his family and is mocked and rejected by everyone. But nobody knows how the swan’s egg ended up in a duck’s nest. In this episode, SANDRA and FO have to resolve this mystery, having been called out by the parents of the UGLY DUCKLING, two swans who are the KING and QUEEEN of the birds. SANDRA will manage to thwart a plot to kill the “Ugly Duckling”, the prince of birds.

programme.title: Historias de amor en Sunflower Valley
programme.desc: Kate regresa a su pueblo para un reportaje, acompañada por su colega, para explorar historias de amor locales.

programme.title: Primero el amor
programme.desc: Para salvar el restaurante de su padre, Olivia debe colaborar con un famoso chef que su padre contrató.

programme.title: Cuando seas mío
programme.desc: Nikita apostó con amigos de que Alena se enamoraría de él. La chica le cree, pero pronto Nikita deja a Alena.

programme.title: Cuando seas mío
programme.desc: Nikita apostó con amigos de que Alena se enamoraría de él. La chica le cree, pero pronto Nikita deja a Alena.

programme.title: American Thought Leaders
programme.desc: Featuring in-depth discussions with some of America's most influential thought leaders.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: Kalbi Dalili
programme.desc: Director: Ismail Farouk - Cast: Sameh Hussein /Mai Kassab - Year of production: 2013

programme.title: Al Harmi Wal Abit
programme.desc: Director: Mohamed Mostafa - Cast:Khaled Elsawy / khaled Saleh / Rouby - Year of production:2013

programme.title: Mohtaram Ela 1/4
programme.desc: Director:Mohamed Hamdy - Cast:Mohamed Ragab /Lameta Frenjia - Year of production: 2010

programme.title: Feraar Momyaa
programme.desc: Cast: Nelly Karim / Samy El Adl / Maged El Masry

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: Secret Agent 1943
programme.desc: Superman battles saboteurs determined to stop a lady double agent from getting important documents to Washington D.C.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: Much ado About Nutting 1953
programme.desc: A squirrel in a downtown park lugs a giant coconut back home, but nothing he does can seem to crack it open.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: A Date to Skate
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Balloon Land-1935
programme.desc: The inhabitants, including the trees and rocks, of Balloon Land are made entirely of balloons. They come under attack from the evil Pincushion Man. With the help of a quickly inflated army, they manage to fend off the attack.

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: Felix the Cat - Felix in Holly wood -1923
Nearly Weds 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto both plan to marry Olive Oyl, but Popeye proposes first. When Olive says, "Yes!" to Popeye, Bluto sets out to make Popeye look bad, break up the wedding, and win Olive over.

programme.title: West of Hot Dog 1924
programme.desc: On his way to collect inheritance in the small town on Hot Dog, Stan gets robbed by highwaymen, one of which is the other person who shall attend the reading of their late Uncle's will. The reading of the will states Stan will get everything, including 'The Last Chance Saloon', but in the case of Stan's death, the saloon will be split between Bad Mike and his friend. Stan nows flees town, but gets on Bad Mike's horse, which takes him to Bad Mike's house. Bad Mike and his gang arrive at the house, after robbing the saloon. They soon hear Stan, and an epic gun battle follows, with the town Sheriff not far behind.

programme.title: The Pawnshop- 1916
programme.desc: Charlie competes with his fellow shop assistant. He is fired by the pawnbroker and rehired. He nearly destroys everything in the shop and himself. He helps capture a burglar. He destroys a client's clock while examining it in detail

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 28; The Rival
programme.desc: When Opie's efforts fail to attract classmate Karen's personal interest, Thelma Lou steps in to boost Opie's confidence but destroys Barney's along the way. Can Andy realign this skewed love quadrangle?

programme.title: His Favorite Pastime - 1914
programme.desc: A very plastered fella follows a pretty woman home, and proceeds to make a nuisance of himself

programme.title: The Vagabond- 1916
programme.desc: Charlie, the emotional violinist, flees to a gipsy camp, only to find himself playing for an abducted girl. Soon, a unique birthmark will pave the way for an unexpected rescue and a marvellous new life. But, will she forget him so easily?

programme.title: The Jack Benny Program; Season 3;Episode 3; Jack Gets Robbed
programme.desc: Jack is pestered by a young autograph seeker, then Bob Crosby sings a medley of songs from "Peter Pan" to the child. After the show, Jack has trouble getting to sleep because of a leaky faucet and forces Rochester to rock his bed. Finally asleep, a pair of burglars try to ransack Jack's bedroom but are defeated by his booby traps.

programme.title: His Double Life-1933
programme.desc: Priam Farrel is a celebrated artist but a social recluse. When his valet dies of a sudden illness, a mix-up leads to the body being identified as Farrel's. The timid artist then assumes the identity of his former servant, but finds himself faced with constant dilemmas as a result.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ARI GLOBAL - LA PERIODISTA QUE TE CAMBIARÁ LA MIRADA SOBRE LOS FAMOSOS
programme.desc:
En este episodio entrevistamos a Ari Global, nacida entre el prestigioso medio de comunicación venezolano "Cisneros Media" ahora dedica su vida al periodismo, la periodista nos cuenta cómo es entrevistar a las celebridades más famosas y cuál cree que sea el secreto de su éxito. Además hablamos de su libro en donde narra en primera persona muchas de estas entrevistas.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MARAVILLA MARTÍNEZ - CUÁNDO SERÁ SU ÚLTIMA VEZ EN EL RING?
programme.desc:
En nuestro primer episodio hablamos con Maravilla Martínez acerca de su carrera, sus comienzos, su presente, los desafíos atravesados en el camino, las terapias alternativas como las regresiones a vidas pasadas y mucho más!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: Concierto Poético de Laura Chimaras: 6 Poemas de Amor y Vida | Música en Vivo | Memorias
STEPHANIE CARRILLO: "La maternidad transformó mi vida" | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 3
programme.desc:
En este episodio tenemos a Stefi Carrillo, quien nos comparte un testimonio conmovedor de resiliencia y lucha. Su maternidad, resultado de un tratamiento de fertilización in vitro, marcó un nuevo capítulo lleno de desafíos y alegrías. Con dos mellizas y una carrera exitosa, Stefi demuestra que con fe, apoyo y determinación, es posible equilibrar sueños profesionales y la vida personal.
Este es un llamado a todas las mujeres para que, con valentía, sigan adelante enfrentando los desafíos, se cuiden y celebren sus logros, porque, como dice Stefi, reconocer nuestro propio valor es parte esencial de ese camino. Roche nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio.

programme.title: MELINA VICARIO: “No existe cura sin el miedo al diagnóstico” | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 4
programme.desc:
En el último episodio de Agente del Cambio, Meli Vicario nos regala una poderosa lección de vida, compartiendo su historia de lucha, esperanza y superación. Nos recuerda la importancia de escuchar nuestro cuerpo, de nunca rendirnos y de ser tenaces cuando buscamos respuestas para nuestra salud y nuestra vida.
A través de su experiencia, Meli hace un llamado a todas las personas, y nos recuerda que, aunque los diagnósticos pueden ser difíciles y los caminos inciertos, nunca debemos dejar de buscar respuestas ni permitir que nuestra voz se apague.
Roche, nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio, un movimiento que invita a levantar la voz, compartir nuestras historias, y luchar por una atención médica más equitativa y accesible para todos.

programme.title: Confessions Of A Time Traveler The Man From 3036
Guests Jamal Bates, Allen B.
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Guests Jamal Bates and Allen B., who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guests Dr. Wes Bellamy, Mayor Nikuyah Walker, Will Jones
programme.desc: This weeks conversation revolves around the documentary 'A Time to Yell More Than a Statue' that explores the events surrounding the Unite the Right Rally in Charlottesville in 2017. The guests, Dr. Wes Bellamy and Mayor Nikuyah Walker, discuss the importance of telling their own story and reclaiming the narrative. They address the challenges of fighting against hate and racism in their community, the significance of removing Confederate statues, and the need for healing and unity. The conversation also touches on the role of running and community engagement in the healing process. The conversation delves into the impact of the events in Charlottesville, particularly the summer of 2017, and the ongoing fight against hate and racism. The guests discuss the buildup to the events of August 11th and 12th, the division in the community, and the role of the police chief. They also explore the concept of heritage and hate, the importance of representation, and the sacrifices made in the fight for justice. The conversation emphasizes the need for courage, gratitude, and unity in the face of adversity.

programme.title: Guests Dexter Crayton, Keafta Dokes, and Tiffany 'The Beverage Boss'
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Dexter Crayton, Keafta Dokes, and Tiffany 'The Beverage Boss', who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Herb Frazier
programme.desc: It's not often thought of our Gullah Geechee ancestors as conservatives, but when you think about it, that's how they lived. With traditional skills and practices from West Africa, they used their community and daily way of living to be self-sustaining and self-sufficient. Those time honored skills of independence and strength also were rooted in the characteristics of fierce loyalty and patriotism. Our ancestors were built with all of the survival skills that they needed to to survive and thrive. Join our conversation with Herb Frazier, journalist and co-author of Sleeping with the Ancestors.

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Magnifique Montreal
programme.desc: Montreal is dripping with culture and cuisine and Eunice Reyes takes you on a dazzling food tour.

programme.title: Infinity And Back
programme.desc: Infinity and Back is the story of one man's dream to stand on the very top of the world, Mt. Everest

programme.title: Jamaican Stuffed Sweet Potato
programme.desc: Gabrielle Reyes, aka One Great Vegan, makes magic with sweet potatoes! Sing it, girl! And, get more

programme.title: Summer of Compassion
programme.desc: From the nation's capital to Orlando, Florida, Thomas and Melody's adventure is an education!

programme.title: Preserving A Dharma Kingdom
programme.desc: In a world ripped apart by greed &violence, one nation measures Gross National Happiness!

programme.title: The Wicked Kitchen-3 Mind Bending Mushrooms to Cook With
programme.desc: Three amazing mushrooms and the techniques used to cook them.

programme.title: Meet the Chickens -Short Film
programme.desc: This short and uplifting film will change everything you thought you knew about chickens!

programme.title: There Was A Killing
programme.desc: Regan Russell’s tragic death exposes the dark side of animal agriculture in this gripping film.

programme.title: Angel
programme.desc: After his daughter goes missing, a wealthy contractor hires a group of investigative journalists to probe into an abandoned town with hope of uncovering clues about her disappearance...

programme.title: Early Grave
programme.desc: On the eve of their ten year high school reunion, six people are summoned to the isolated country estate of one of their former friends, now a famous horror writer. Once there, separated by guilt, yet bound together by a terrible secret, seven adults try to reconnect with each other, and take stock of their lives. Outside, the storm clouds gather. Rain, lightning and wind isolate the house by washing out the road and knocking down the power lines. And then, they begin to be brutally murdered one by one. Someone is out there in the wind and the rain, someone who has waited for ten years to wreak a terrible vengeance on this group. Seven friends find themselves in a struggle to survive and outwit a diabolical killer who is savagely committed to sending them all to an EARLY GRAVE...

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a mysterious crash and uncovers more than an object, but a massive government conspiracy. Inspired by the real life events of December 9, 1965 and one of America's most mysterious UFO incidents...

programme.title: Witch Trials
programme.desc: Two documentary filmmakers and an ex-cop investigate the disappearance of a young girl that is rumored to have been abducted by a witch in the haunted woods of Connecticut...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Demonio Interior
programme.desc: Años después de salir de la cárcel, Sam Parsons intenta rehacer su vida con su mujer Courtney y su hija Harper. Trabaja duro para mantener a su familia y permitirse una bonita casa en su tranquilo barrio de las afueras. Cuando empiezan a ocurrir sucesos sobrenaturales en la casa, Sam teme por la seguridad de su mujer y su hija. Cuando los sucesos se convierten en ataques, Sam contrata a Corbin Carlysle y a su equipo de cazafantasmas conocido como «The Ghost Killers», para que le ayuden a luchar contra la entidad oscura que acecha en las sombras de su casa. Cuando las cosas empiezan a complicarse y queda claro que esta entidad es mucho más peligrosa que el típico fantasma, surgen complicaciones cuando Corbin y su equipo se centran más en la fama y la fortuna. Para ganar esta lucha Sam debe luchar contra sus propios demonios interiores y volver a su violento pasado. Para salvar a sus seres queridos, un Demonio debe enfrentarse a un Demonio.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: 6 Impactos
programme.desc: John Solís interpreta al pulpo, un traficante que vive el infierno de tener a su hijo muy enfermo y necesita una operación de vida o muerte. Así que el pulpo tendrá que hacer hasta lo imposible para juntar el dinero que necesita para dicha operación.

programme.title: El Cartel de la Línea
programme.desc: UNA MUJER Y SU HIJO ESTÁN EN BÚSQUEDA DE SU ESPOSO ERNESTO DESPUÉS DE QUE FUE DEPORTADO DE ESTADOS UNIDOS A TIJUANA BAJA CALIFORNIA MEXICO, SIN SABER NADA DE SU PARADERO. MIENTRAS TANTO ERNESTO CONOCE A DON DIEGO QUIÉN LO ENSEÑA A TRABAJAR EN CARROCERÍA. Y EN ESE TALLER LLEGA EL PRIMO UN JEFE DE UN CARTEL Y LE OFRECE TRABAJO A ERNESTO PARA GANAR DINERO FÁCIL.

programme.title: Amar a Morir
programme.desc: Amar a Morir cuenta la historia de Alejandro (Jose Maria de Tavira) y Rosa (Martina García). Él, habitante de la gran ciudad, heredero de un imperio bancario, rodeado de hipocresía, corrupción y desamor, tiene un futuro que ha sido planeado por su padre. Ella, una mujer maravillosa y humilde proveniente de un pueblo de la costa del Océano Pacífico, está atrapada en un mundo al cual no pertenece.

programme.title: Fantasías
programme.desc: La historia de Brenda y Antonio, una pareja de clase media con dos hijos adolescentes y una vida sexual aburrida, en busca de nuevas experiencias, primero con su sexy sirvienta. Más tarde, siguiendo el consejo de Esther, una amiga mayor que tiene un estilo de vida swinger junto con su esposo, deciden explorar la posibilidad de despertar una nueva pasión al ligar con Miguel y Claudia, una pareja swinger. Pero luego llegan los problemas.

programme.title: Escape En Vivo
programme.desc: Un investigador paranormal descubre una tierra de nadie infernal en un remoto y olvidado paisaje desértico donde payasos malvados esperan en un purgatorio sobrenatural para enfrentar su destino como venganza por sus malas acciones.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes investigadores de fenómenos paranormales reciben el reto de pasar un fin de semana en una casa donde habitan seres malignos. Esto con el fin de presentar las evidencias en su programa de televisión y levantar el rating, pero lo que no saben es que el reto les costara muy caro.

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: When God Gets Ready
programme.desc: People label, but God names. You don’t have to chase identity or earn worth, because you’ve always been called, loved, and set apart for something more.

programme.title: When God Says Let Go
programme.desc: Is your faith being tested? If you’ve been waiting on the details of what God has next, remember that God doesn’t give a test without a lesson first, so if He’s calling you to let go of something, you can trust He’s already provided you with what you’ll need to take that step.

programme.title: Think Like A Reaper
programme.desc: In “Think Like A Reaper,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to think about the outcome while living in the fear, frustration, and fatigue of right now. You’ll be encouraged that God is with you in your hard place, and help is closer than you realize.

programme.title: This Is What A Miracle Feels Like
programme.desc: Sometimes, a miracle feels like you’re free, but you’re still running. Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us to look for signs that God is at work when our feelings haven’t caught up to our reality in “This Is What A Miracle Feels Like.”

programme.title: The God Of Pieces
programme.desc: The devil wants to keep you overwhelmed by your situation, but God wants to show you how to deal with it piece by piece. And as you learn to praise God for the piece you have, you’ll experience the peace you’ve been praying for.
